channel.title: Public RSC Server Dev Cleanup
channel.description:
yharodarbartsechs,
I'm just requesting the mod team to try and keep the public rsc server dev section clean and retard free.
Personally, I think anything regarding the client (eg, I need client, How do I edit client, etc) should be instantly removed because, quite frankly, if you're too stupid to know how to get the client and modify it you're not wanted.
Not to mention stupid questions regarding data files, where to get servers from etc.
I mean, come on.

item.title: Public RSC Server Dev Cleanup
item.dc:creator: @BobDole81 BobDole81
item.description:
@BobDole81 wrote:

You’re right, It is irritating…so many people saying “I’ll help out” when they can’t even figure out how to get the client running.

I personally think its a good idea - if others do too, I will start and I’ll add onto Ms Silab’s sticky

Read full topic
